gw.api.json

Class JsonParser<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.json.JsonParser<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the Java type to which to parse

    public final class JsonParser<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Specific kinds of JSON parsing, e.g. JsonParser.OBJECT.parse(object), JsonAccess.STRING.parseArray(object) These include any possible JSON types that can be specified, including qualified by format or x-gw-type

    • Method Detail

      • typeKey

        public static <TK extends TypeKey> JsonParser<TK> typeKey(@NotNull
                                                          @NotNull java.lang.Class<TK> typeKeyClass)
        For parsing a specific typekey
        Type Parameters:
        TK - the typelist, e.g., typekey.Currency.class
        Parameters:
        typeKeyClass - the typelist, e.g., typekey.Currency.class
        Returns:
        the typekey, e.g., Currency.TC_USD

      • parse

        @NotNull
public T parse(@Nullable
                        @Nullable java.lang.String json,
                        @Nullable
                        @Nullable JsonSchemaDefinition schemaDefinition,
                        @Nullable
                        @Nullable JsonValidationResult validationResult,
                        @Nullable
                        @Nullable JsonDeserializationOptions jsonDeserializationOptions)
        Parses JSON into an object of type T
        Parameters:
        json - the JSON string to parse, can be null
        schemaDefinition - the JSON schema definition against which to parse JSON objects, can be null
        validationResult - the validation result in which to store any parsing errors, can be null
        jsonDeserializationOptions - the JSON deserialization options, can be null, in particular for specifying the default formats and gw-types to apply to scalars not specified by a schema definition
        Returns:
        an object of type T
        Throws:
        JsonParseException - if the parse fails for invalid JSON
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if the parsed object is null or JsonAccess.test(java.lang.Object) fails

      • parse

        @NotNull
public T parse(@Nullable
                        @Nullable java.lang.String json,
                        @Nullable
                        @Nullable java.lang.String schemaDefinitionFQN,
                        @Nullable
                        @Nullable JsonValidationResult validationResult,
                        @Nullable
                        @Nullable JsonDeserializationOptions jsonDeserializationOptions)
        Parses JSON into an object of type T
        Parameters:
        json - the JSON string to parse, can be null
        schemaDefinitionFQN - the fully qualified name of the JSON schema definition against which to parse JSON objects, can be null
        validationResult - the validation result in which to store any parsing errors, can be null
        jsonDeserializationOptions - the JSON deserialization options, can be null, in particular for specifying the default formats and gw-types to apply to scalars not specified by a schema definition
        Returns:
        an object of type T
        Throws:
        JsonParseException - if the parse fails for invalid JSON
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if the parsed object is null or JsonAccess.test(java.lang.Object) fails
